item.title: Gimje, Jeonbuk, Korea - Gimje Arirang Literary Village
item.description:
A panoramic view of Arirang Literary Village Public Relations Hall

Gimje Arirang Literary Village

Gimje, Jeonbuk, Korea

'Ginger blind gang other emmit'. 'Jinge' means 'Gimje', 'Meng Gang' means Mangyeong, and 'Oemit' means lazy people. It is the old saying of Gimje Mangyeong Plain, Korea's representative granary. The wicked horde of Japanese colonial beasts have been spreading the land since the early 1900s. To send military beauty to the battlefield to fill their ambitions. The novelist Jo Jung-rae wrote in Arirang the history of suffering and resistance that the minchos had to face in this process.
Meet the years of raging in the novel Arirang
Why is the title of the novel Arirang? Arirang is a song that our people shared with us when we were happy or sad. The background of the novel is from the pre-Korean merger to liberation, when Arirang's ringing is the loudest. Let's take a look at the audience watching Na Un Kyu's movie Arirang in Arirang. "Kim Young-jin is being dragged by the Japanese police and the melody of" Arirang "that the band plays begins. Arirang Arirang Aririo .... When the chorus was just over, "to the independence of Korea!" It was a man's cry. "To the independence of Korea!" The novelist Cho Jung-rae said that he easily wrote the title Arirang. This may be because there is no title as appropriate as Arirang.
The novel Arirang
Arirang Literature Village reproduces the stage of the novel Arirang in reality, revealing the painful days without filtration. Since the story of Arirang begins in Juksan-myeon, Gimje-si, it has been built around the old inner village and Oori village, so travelers can experience living literature. Arirang Literary Village is largely composed of public relations hall, Harbin station, Naechon and Oeri village, and modern seizure agency. The PR Hall is itself a friendly guide to Arirang.
PR Hall 1F
Although Arirang is a best-selling book, many of them have been burdened with reading because it is a 12-volume novel. The first floor of the PR building filled the walls with text about Arirang. The plot of the flow of the novel, the portrayal of the characters and the relationship of the main characters, and the excerpts of the core anecdotes in the novel are organized in a structure. Just look around slowly and read easily to find out what Arirang is.
PR Hall 2F Letter Sculpture
On the 2nd floor of the PR Hall, there are descriptions of independent militants from Kim Je. Unfamiliar heroes protested against Japan for fear of death. The devastation of an unjust age would have led to their consequences. Independence troops rushing with guns symbolically represent this.
Independence Army Statue
Harbin Station and Seolwoon Village, a village that recreates the best scenes of modern history
Harbin Station in Arirang Literary Village is a 60% reduction of Harbin Station in China in the 1910s.
State of Harbin Station
Combining the historical background of Harbin and Arirang, there is an incident that comes to mind quickly. According to Harbin Ahn (1909). When you go out through the waiting room in the area, the best scenes of modern history are realistically expressed in statues. When Ahn Jung-geun pulls the trigger, a bullet carrying the nation's core penetrates the heart of the empire. Ito Hirobumi was shortly after getting off the train, so steam locomotives also appeared in those days.
Harbin's scene of Ahn Jung-geun
Harbin Station itself is a two-story exhibition hall related to Arirang, just like a publicity hall.
Harbin station 2nd floor comfort women statue
There is an immigrant house in front of Harbin station square. Reproduced the house and the reed house built by people who went to other country because of the Japanese colonial exploitation. At least you and your house are likely to play a role, but the reeds are too poor. In Arirang, a reed hut appears. "People who gathered a bunch of reeds began to make huts. The huts were to dig the ground into man's height and cover the roof with reeds on it."
Immigrant houses
Naechon and Oeori villages were made by reproducing houses such as Son Pan-seok, Jisam-chul, Gamgol-d's house, and Song-in-ri.
Hand-painted houses
It is a village that has idyllic ambience with neighboring thatched houses with small backs. But the landlords' lives described in the novel are not as peaceful as the town's exterior.
View of Naechon Village
Son Pan-Suk works as a liaison to the medical and independent forces and suffers a lot. Ji-chul is retaliated by the pro-Japanese Jang Chi-ilmun for his misdeeds. Gamgol is suffering from debt because his eldest son is sold to Hawaii because of debt, and his two daughters are humiliated by Japanese minions. When my eldest daughter says she's going to a concubine because of poverty, she says, "We must starve together and die together." Anyone who knows the sad story of a peaceful town can't control his feelings.
Art work near town
Modern exploitation agency built by evil in Japan
The modern exploitation agency is the place where the pain of Arirang is best conveyed. It is composed of a cotton office, a representative office (the agency where the Japanese colonial rule was employed), a post office, and a rice mill.
Modern collection agency street
The municipal office is the leading organization in the exploitation of land. Baek Jong-du, a pro-Japanese leader appointed to Juksan-myeon in Arirang, opposes the peasants by forming a landlord commissioner (a vanguard that pursues the land inspection project of the governor general). It is a land survey project, but it is a trick to take away the land of Joseon by attaching a secret bad clause. In the Juksan-myeon Office, there are telescopes, compasses, cameras, abacus, and lighters. It is obvious that it was used as a tool for evil.
Exhibition office
Is there another place as scary as the Japanese colonial rule? As soon as you enter the shelter, the sound of the sound comes out, creating an eerie feeling. "The military police made the same sound every time they wielded. It wasn't what they wanted to answer. It was a beat to save my deity in the medium, and a spirit to cheer me up." There are all kinds of torture tools, such as a whip. Inside the barbed window, the sad eyes of the imprisoned prisoners are expressed in murals, accusing the cruelty of Japan.
Picture of the wall inside the iron bars of the detention center
The post office was nothing more than a Japanese-language intelligence agency, and the mill was the only place for rice for the Japanese.
Post Office Front View
The woman's scream is heard in the mill. It's the sound of a female employee who was so hungry that she burst into the wind while stealing a little bit of rice. We need to steal rice from our land… The lives of the lost folks are cruel.
Interior view of the mill
Travel info

Arirang Literary Village
-Address: 180 Hwacho-ro, Juksan-myeon, Gimje-si, Jeonbuk
Contact: 063-540-2927, 063-540-2929


Restaurants near
-Elevation: abalone mussel champon / 31, Buyangmyeon Buyang 1-gil / 063-546-6577
-Scent of Life: Hansiksik / 190-14 Wonpyeong 1-gil, Geumsan-myeon / 063-543-2325

https://sh55.modoo.at/

-Unam Maeuntang: Maeuntang / 220, Dongseo-ro, Gimje-si / 063-542-0431


Rooms
-Moaksan Youth Hostel: 460-20 Moak-ro, Geumsan-myeon / 063-548-4401

http://www.moakyh.co.kr/

-Star Palace Motel: Hajeong 1-gil 9 / 063-547-1005
-Red Sky Motel: 48 Hajeong 1-gil / 063-546-2579

item.title: Sunchang-gun, Jeonbuk, Korea - Put red pepper paste, beat rice cake, make rice, and experience Jangchang
item.description:
Sunchang Paste Experience Center

Put red pepper paste, beat rice cake, make rice, and experience Jangchang

Sunchang-gun, Jeonbuk, Korea

'Jang Jang Sunchang' is Sunchang's slogan. This is a good expression of Sunchang, famous for gochujang. If you go to Sunchang Gochujang, gochujang is Sunchang. I made a traditional Jangjang paste of Sunchang, cooked foods made with soy sauce, and made a hands-on experience program to make healthy snacks. The children are very funny and even eat delicious. It is an experience where even adults grow happy.
Spicy rice cake pizza dough ~
10 am Saturday. As soon as you arrive at Sunchang Jangjang Experience Hall, you will be busy. The Jangjang experience program will take about 2 hours, including gochujang making, gochujang cooking, and seasoning of rice cakes and tofu.
Gochujang Bulgogi Pizza Making Experience
To make an effective time arrangement, we first cooked the Jangjang, then make the Injeolmi and Tumbap outside, and finally, make Gochujang. Today's dish is made from gochujang pizza with gochujang bulgogi. In addition to Gochujang Bulgogi Pizza, you can choose from Kimchi, Gochujang Spaghetti, Cheonggukjang-jjigae, Cheese Tteokbokki, Gochujang Namul Gimbap, etc. What's interesting is that instead of pizza dough, cut the rice cake into thin pans like rice cake for rice cake soup. All you need to do is pour the dough on top so that the rice cakes don't fall and stick together. Place bulgogi seasoned with red pepper paste on top of rice cake dough and sprinkle chopped vegetables with topping. Sprinkle plenty of cheese on top and decorate with ketchup. Switch on the pan with the lid on and wait for it to finish.
Gochujang Bulgogi Pizza Making Experience
Close your ears and say "Yeah ~"
While the pizza is ripe, go outside to make Injeolmi and rice. Injeolmi is the key to rice cake making. At first, adults have to take turns to crush rice grains. Tteokme is more fun and less difficult to stand and beat each other by hitting each other.
Injeolmi making experience
When the rice is crushed in moderation, change it to children's rice cake and give it to the children. Like a funny play, the children wait anxiously for their turn. After hitting three or four times, the sound of rice cakes is getting louder and louder. The black hot frying machine is turned gently to increase the pressure. The children are squeezed the handles so that they can see them once, but I'm excited to know what's coming out. Finally, I'm going to explode. The children close their ears tightly and look at the machine. "뻥 ~!" White steam is rising with a loud noise. The children rushed in when they put rice rice in a large basket. Fill your hands with greed and bury your face. It is fried quickly and its taste is very delicious. Children eat more rice than any snack.
Tempura making experience
In the meantime, Injeolmi is completed and soaked with soy flour. Child who slices rice cake, child who gets soybean powder, experience that is behind the scenes and busy to eat… . They enjoy making and eating in different ways. Injeolmi is a good combination of soybean flour mixed with chewy rice cakes. I made it and ate it right away, so the cuts of rice and the rice are delicious. It is not a taste of memories, but a taste that surpasses memories.
Tempura making experience
Taste pizza and make gochujang
After the outdoor experience, go back into the experience room. A well baked pizza is waiting. Thanks to the red pepper paste on the dough made with rice cakes, the pizza is perfect for the taste of Koreans. Gochujang seasoning is a bit spicy, but it is eaten instantly. After the pizza tasting, the highlight of the day is the red pepper paste making experience.
Gochujang making experience
First, listen to why Sunchang Gochujang is delicious and how to make it. In other regions, square meju is used to make soy sauce, soybean paste, and red pepper paste. What is unusual is that the meju is usually picked in early winter, but Sunchang makes meju at the end of August. When the weather is hot, the microorganisms that add the rich flavor of red pepper paste multiply well. Another special feature of Sunchang is that it is not only made from soybeans but also mixed with rice at 6: 4 ratio. Soybean paste is soaked in winter and aged for more than 6 months.
Gochujang making experience
After listening to the explanation, take a moment to make a gochujang quiz. The experience is surprisingly simple. Distribute bowls of mew flour, red pepper powder, Sikhye, salt, and malt in the right proportions by team. The secret is to mix them well so that they don't clump together. Mix it up and dip it with your finger to taste it. It's a strange taste. Gochujang is not made right away because it needs to be aged. As time goes by, our traditional Jangjang, which tastes deeper, is truly slow food. If you leave the gochujang made by the visitors in the experience hall, they will gather them together and mix them well. Instead of making it on-site, you will receive a well-cooked gochujang one by one.
Gochujang making experience
Gochujang Village to preserve the traditional taste
After enjoying the Jangju experience, take a look around Gochujang Village. In Kochujang Village, Kochujang can be produced and sold only if you are recognized as a master of Kochujang. The merchandise in the market is almost reliable. All you see here is the red pepper paste shop, so it's as if you're in the red pepper paste country. Gochujang Nara is not a small Gochujang village, but it is enough to catch our taste.
Sunchang Red Pepper Village
In the yard, there are many jars of red pepper paste, miso and soy sauce, and the pickles smell like pol-pol in the store. Jangjang is good, but rice thief pickles are just as popular. There are many kinds of pickles such as plums, radishes, cucumbers, garlic seeds, sweet persimmons, sesame leaves, deodeok, scallops, oysters, etc. You can taste and choose different kinds of pickles.
Sunchang Red Pepper Village
There is also a rice wine jar next to it. The pickles that are eaten in the mouth are salty, but when you taste them after sipping the rice wine, "kya" sound comes out. Cheonggukjang smells very little and tastes so mild that children eat well. The steps are so great when you pick up pickles in a hot pepper paste made by a master.
Sunchang Red Pepper Village
I have tried making jang but I do not make delicious jang. How much effort do you compare to the workmanship of a master who has been in the market forever?
Sunchang Red Pepper Village
Travel info

Sunchang Paste Experience Center
-Address: 55, Folk Village-gil, Sunchang-eup, Sunchang-gun, Jeollabuk-do
-Experience program: Make Soonchang Traditional Red Pepper Paste, Make Korean Cuisine, Make Injeol, Make Traditional Tofu
-When using the experience program, you can use the accommodation facilities in the experience hall.

http://www.janghada.com/


※ The above information was updated in March 2017 and may change afterwards, so please check before you travel.
※ The information such as text, photos and videos used in this article is copyrighted by Korea Tourism Organization, so unauthorized use of the article is prohibited.

item.title: Gunsan, Jeonbuk, Korea - Gunsan Sinsi-do, a place to catch saltwater fish
item.description:
Experiencers enjoying the opening under the rising sun

Gunsan Sinsi-do, a place to catch saltwater fish

Gunsan, Jeonbuk, Korea

The place where we could meet 90 minutes by boat from Gunsan Port came to us with a fantastic drive course and superb view. I have met Shinsi-do, a place with beautiful and secluded island scenery and exciting fun.
Gogunsan-gun is a must-see
The road that has no end, the sea and the vast sea that surrounds it are mysterious. Saemangeum room, where we changed the map of South Korea in April 2010
Lovers enjoying a date at Saemangeum Seawall
zero
Road to Wolyeongjae behind Saemangeum Service Area
In the middle of the embankment is Shinsido, which is designated as the Knoll Island among the four-color autumn themed islands selected by the Ministry of Tourism and the Korea Tourism Organization.
Yellow ribbon to indicate winding
In Sinsido, people began to live in the early days of Silla due to the herring of herring around the island. Gogunsan-gun, with its beautiful scenery called “star in the lake,” is the largest of the 24 islands. I would like to stop for a while and leave a picture if I am running along a cool road along the embankment. That's why it's nice to see a rest area or an observatory. One of the most famous is the Saemangeum Rest Area, which is located at the highest 199 peak (199 m above sea level) in Sinsi-do. Opposite is a monument to the construction of the Saemangeum Seawall.
Monument to build Saemangeum Seawall opposite the Saemangeum Rest Area
It is not so difficult to see the landscape of Gogunsan-gun at the rest area. Behind the parking lot of the rest area, there is a way up to Wolyeongjae which is a 7 course of Gunsan winding road. It is an alley connecting Sinsi-do and the embankment, and it can be said to be the starting point for the realization of Gogunsan-gun. As you climb the slope, you will find a crossroad between 199 and Wolyeongbong. Wolyeongbong is composed of columnar joints that can be enjoyed in Jeju Island.
Superb view of Gogunsan archipelago from 199bong
If you want to capture both the Gogunsan-gun and Saemangeum embankments, head to 199. The hiking trail that climbs to the 199 mountain peak is less intimidating than it might be due to the appearance of the Gogunsan archipelago.
Saemangeum dike seen downhill from the summit
199 peaks so arrived. Gogunsan-gun, facing Haemu, is a masterpiece drawn by nature enough to paralyze the nerves of the whole body. I want to sit down and watch the sunset, but it's hard to come down when it's dark.
Middle-aged couple sitting side by side and looking at Gogunsan-gun
The finishing strokes, opening of Nol Island
When it is said to go in and experience, the people who change their boots to go to the mud flats quickly and easily. This is because it is a perfect moment for you to feel the taste of fish thicker than your forearm. It is the site of the “opening experience”, which is the No. 1 public trust that made the new city a “nole island”.
A child holding her mother's hand and looking over the mud flat
Opening is the traditional fishing way to catch fish. At low tide, the pine pilings are semi-oval on the mud flats, and the bottom of the net is buried along the pilings on the bottom of the mud flats. At high tide, we sailed out of the boat, hung the top of the net on the pine stakes, and spread the net.
State of children enjoying Gaemagi
The expectation that fishing is difficult due to the muddy water is missed nicely. If the water depth gets shallower, the mullet, which is over 50cm long, will appear, but it is more appropriate to say that it is difficult to catch it with great force. Feel for the first time in life
State of children enjoying Gaemagi
Experience is not possible every day, so make a reservation after checking the date by phone or through the website. It's a fishing method using tea, so you can experience it around the corner. Also, don't be late for experience. You should start on time to enjoy longer.
Gray Mullet
The Sinsido Fishing Village offers free boot rental for an easy opening experience. However, the fish scales are slippery, so preparing a paddock is essential. It's a good idea to get extra clothes because you may get wet in the sea or you might fall off a mud flat.
Large amount of fish caught enough to prepare icebox
Travel info

New Sidor Village Village
Address: 83-7 Sinsido-gil, Okdo-myeon, Gunsan-si, Jeollabuk-do
Contact / Reservation: 063-463-7088

http://vill.seantour.com/Vill/Main.aspx?fvno=3707


1. Nearby restaurants

Lee Sungdang: 177, Jungang-ro, Gunsan-si, Jeollabuk-do / Angge bread, Vegetable bread / 063-445-2772
Bokseongru: 382, Wolmyeong-ro, Gunsan-si, Jeollabuk-do / Champon, Udon, Jajangmyeon / 063-445-8412

item.title: Frozen, Naesosa Temple in the White Snow
item.description:
Dawn of Goat Salt Dishes

Frozen, Naesosa Temple in the White Snow

Buan-gun, Jeonbuk, Korea

This Byeonsan Winter Travel Course is prepared with 'Naesosa-Gear Sosa Salt Paste', which binds inner and outer mountains at once. Not to mention the millennium consideration Nae Sosa, Gomso woven in one course, and decided to take a look at the salt pant. Gomyeojeon, which has been famous for a long time, in the West Sea, I will not be involved in the salting technique developed to eat abundant seafood for a long time. The winter Gomyeojeonjeon is a vivid landscape filled with ice snow glittering like salt instead of salt. If you add the quarry river and red river, the outland mountain is perfect for winter sea travel.

A trip to the West Sea, where you can see everything at sunrise and sunset, becomes even more abundant in winter. Is it thanks to the seasonal foods? Is it the power of white snow? One winter, during the heavy snowfall of the West Coast, I visited Buan Byeonsan Peninsula, the pearl of the West Sea. I missed the winter landscape of the Naesosa fir forest road and the arid seasons of the Reddish River and the Quarry River.

Buan Byeonsan Peninsula, Pearl of the West Sea
It's a winter torsion. A salt field, salted out as it is. Snowy salt fields resembling white salt are more serene and beautiful than you might think.
Salt storage for salt
In addition, if the day is clear, you can see the sunrise at Gomso Port.
Before dawn
The Saemangeum Public Relations Hall is the first to greet you when you enter Buan along Saemangeum Road.
Red wall named for proud scenery
Go up National Route 30 and look around the coast of Byeonsan Peninsula (outside Mt.) and go to Gomso Port or follow the Inner Mt.
The appearance changes depending on the water
Knowing when to bite makes it easier to make copper wires. Because quarrying and reddish rivers are different depending on the time of lifting.
Gyeokpo Beach seen from the top of the chicken

In other words, if it is time for water to fall into the quarry and red water rivers at the time of arrival, you can walk to Naesosa Temple or Gomso Port first. You can check the time at the Byeonsan Peninsula National Park website.

http://byeonsan.knps.or.kr/front/portal/visit/visitCourseMain.do?parkId=121800&menuNo=7020091

Gyeokpo Port, viewed from the top of Chicken Ebon (85m)
When the arrival time is high, stop by the Red Rock and Quarry River first. After eating, go up to Euibong Peak (85m) and look at Byeonsanji vegetation and Gappo Port at a glance.
Evening Gappo Beach with heavy snowfall
Then take National Route 30 and go counterclockwise to reach Gomso Port.
Road to Chicken Ebon (85m)
Wait here! Before you reach Gomso Port, remember the Jeonbuk Student Maritime Training Center located between Evergreen Beach and Mohang Beach. You can enjoy the wonderful fall falling into the sea against the backdrop of Sol Island.
Sol Island Sunset in front of Jeonbuk Student Maritime Training Center
If you want to shoot a good sunset, you should arrive and wait 30 minutes before sunset. If the time is not right, you can see Gomyeojeonjeon or Naesosa first.
Buan Bear Fire Hydrant Sunset
The reporter looked for Naso Sosa in anticipation of seeing the sunrise at Gomso Port. Naesosa is famous for cherry blossoms in spring and colored leaves in autumn. The winter scenery in the white snow does not fall out. If you find it right after the snow piled up would have encountered a more spectacular scenery.
Gappohang Sunset
A Millennial Consideration Meets the Fir Forest Path
According to records such as Dongguk Yeoji Seungram, Naesosa's original name was 'Sorae-sa (蘇 來 寺)'. It has been said that it was named “Naso” because the Chinese Tang Dynasty Chang-Sang Jeong-bang was established. After one week, the path leads to Cheonwangmun and a fir forest path that introduces Nao Sosa Temple, which is more than a thousand years old.
Naesosa
It's about 500m. If you reach the Cheonwangmun through the fir forest that is likely to lead to the Winter Kingdom, it is welcoming to Nasosa. Daewoong Preservation (Treasure No. 291), which appears to be brilliant, almost disappeared. There is a lack of testimonial data and it is preserved as it is without coloring. Along with Seonggyesa Temple, Silsangsa Temple and Changrimsa Temple, it was selected as the 4th largest temple in Byeonsan. Only Naesosa keeps its place for many years.
Seolseon-dang and Yosa reach through one order of Naesosa Temple
The flower pattern grate, which has been dull for the past year, is also eye-catching. At sunset, you can see the shadows of the flower-patterned grate with the red sun. Here is not the end. If you find Naesosa, let's go inside Daewoong Bojeon. There is a statue of White Kannon Bodhisattva on the wall behind the Buddhist altar. If you make an eye upon your eyes, your wish will come true.
Flower pattern grate of Naesosa Temple Daewoong Preservation
Yeongsanhoe Gwanbultang (Treasure No. 1268), Goryeo Dynasty (Treasure No. 277), and a legal book (Treasure No. 278) are also treasures of Naesosa. Due to the large number of external exhibitions, it is rare to be in Naesosa Temple.
Daewoong Preservation of Naesosa Temple
King's beloved salt, resurrected in the modern day salt-bearing salt

After exiting Naesosa, climb National Route 30 and you will soon reach Gomso. Gomso has been famous for salt pans since ancient times. Gyehwabeol was the main production area, but during World War II, it became a land by constructing roads and building dikes linking the interlocking villages with Hodo (Bumseom), Ungyeon Island, and Sokdo during the end of the Japanese War. As such, the 45 hectares of Gomin-so-jeon are located in Gomso Port. The annual salt production boasts 2500 tons. Let's take a quick look at the signboard at the beginning of Gom Gomin.

Gomso's specialty is salt. In the past, salt was so important that it was managed by the state and must not have been sold until recently. One of the things to take to the king's refuge was salt. While man is necessary to live… (syncopation)… The production of salt in Buan was mainly flame, and the area of Gyehwa Daeverly was the main production area. Gomso's good salt taste makes fermented foods such as Gomso Salted Fish, Soybean Soybean Paste, and Cinnamic Bamboo Salt, a specialty.

Gomyeojeon, which has been famous for many years

Gomson solar salt is produced from March to the end of October. You can get salt every summer and every 3 to 5 days in spring and autumn. Summer salt is large in crystals and small in crystals but hard in autumn. Gommon sun salt has little bitter taste because it is not used when the concentration of liver water becomes dark.

I found Gomso salt field before dawn. The snow is still piled up due to the heavy snow on the west coast, which has not yet wakened up from the dark. It is not cloudy and the sun does not appear. Instead, I could see the Gomyeojeonjeon waking up. Slowly dark goes Instead of salt, the snowflake sits on top of the salt pan and shines. Except for the winter, you can also enjoy the Gomyeo salt preservation experience.

Gomyeojeon, which has been famous for many years
Travel info
